body.p: Grayson County, Kentucky farmer. Kentucky native. Married Margaret Laymon. Father of James H. Laymon, John M. Laymon, Jacob W. Laymon, Elizabeth Laymon, William J. Laymon, Thomas Laymon, Stephen P. Laymon, Ann E. Laymon, and Samuel C. Laymon.
